entries.translated: 默认模式
编辑视图
匹配当前视图
自动固定
拖动或调整大小时
在嵌入时触发悬停预览

entries.source: Allow hover preview to trigger when hovering over any type of rendered embed such as images or block references
entries.translated: 允许将鼠标悬停在任何类型的渲染嵌入（例如图像或块引用）上时触发悬停预览

entries.source: Trigger hover preview on sub-heading links
entries.translated: 在子标题链接上触发悬停预览

entries.source: Use hover editor for links to subheadings, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: 对副标题链接使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器

entries.source: Trigger hover preview on block links
entries.translated: 在块链接上触发悬停预览

entries.source: Use hover editor for links to blocks, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: 对区块链接使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器
在脚注上触发悬停预览

entries.source: Use hover editor for footnotes, instead of the built-in preview/editor
entries.translated: 为脚注使用Hover Editor，而不是内置预览/编辑器
自动聚焦

entries.source: Set the hover editor as the active pane when opened
entries.translated: 将Hover Editor设置为打开时的活动窗格
向下最小化

entries.source: When double clicking to minimize, the window will roll down instead of rolling up
entries.translated: 双击最小化时，窗口会向下滚动而不是向上滚动
贴靠边缘

entries.source: Quickly arrange popovers by dragging them to the edges of the screen. The left and right edges will maximize the popover vertically. The top edge will maximize the popover to fill the entire screen. Dragging the popovers away from the edges will restore the popver to its original size.
entries.translated: 通过将弹出窗口拖到屏幕边缘来快速排列。左右边缘将使弹出窗口垂直最大化。顶部边缘将使弹出窗口最大化以填满整个屏幕。将弹出窗口从边缘拖开将恢复其原始大小。
默认显示视图标题

entries.source: Show the view header by default when triggering a hover editor. When disabled, view headers will only show if you click the view header icon to the left of the minimize button.
entries.translated: 触发Hover Editor时默认显示视图标题。禁用时，只有点击最小化按钮左侧的视图标题图标后才会显示出视图标题。
点击放大图片

entries.source: Click and hold an image within a hover editor to temporarily maximize the popover and image to fill the entire viewport. On mouse up, the hover editor will restore to its original size.
entries.translated: 点击并按住Hover Editor中的图片，可暂时最大化弹出窗口和图片，使其充满整个视口。当鼠标向上移动时，Hover Editor将恢复到原来的大小。
初始弹出窗口宽度
输入任何有效的 CSS 单位
初始弹出窗口高度
悬停触发延迟（毫秒）

entries.source: How long to wait before showing a Hover Editor when hovering over a link
entries.translated: 当鼠标悬停在链接上时，显示Hover Editor需要等待多长时间
悬停关闭延迟（毫秒）

entries.source: How long to wait before closing a Hover Editor once the mouse leaves
entries.translated: 鼠标离开后要等待多长时间才能关闭 Hover Editor
